remarks: Closure of subspace orthocomplement for ` DVecA ` partial vector space. (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
docacl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
docacl.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
docacl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
docacl.n $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocA ` K ) ` W ) $.
docaclN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X C_ T ) -> ( ._|_ ` X ) e. ran I ) $.
